Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.action.server.GameContext

package it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.action.server.GameContext
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AbortFlightAction
    Action that allows a player to abort the current flight.
    AcceptAdventureCardAction
    Action that allows a player to accept their drawn AdventureCard.
    ChooseColorAction
    Action that allows a player to choose their color.
    ChooseEnginePowerAction
    Action that allows a player to choose their engine power distribution across batteries.
    ChooseFirePowerAction
    Action that allows a player to choose their firepower distribution across batteries and cannons.
    ChooseMaterialsAction
    Action that allows a player to choose which materials to move into or out of storage.
    ChoosePlanetMaterialsAction
    Action that allows a player to move materials into or out of a planet's storage.
    ClientGameAction
    Action that serves as the base for all game actions initiated by a client.
    CompletedAlienSelectionAction
    Action that allows a player to complete their alien selection phase.
    DeclineAdventureCardAction
    Action that allows a player to decline their drawn AdventureCard.
    EndBuildingLevel2Action
    Action that allows a player to complete the second level of building at a specified position.
    EndBuildingTrialAction
    Action that allows a player to complete the building trial phase.
    GetAdventureCardAction
    Action that allows a player to draw an AdventureCard.
    GetCoordinateAction
    Action that allows a player to retrieve the next hit coordinate from the game context.
    GetEnemiesShipBoardAction
    Action that allows a player to request the ship boards of all enemies.
    GetFreeShipCardAction
    Action that allows a player to obtain a free ship card (or skip by passing a placeholder).
    GetPlayersColorAction
    Action that allows a player to request the current mapping of all players' colors.
    GimmeACoolShipAction
    Action that allows a player to request a "cool" ship board from the server.
    HandleShotAction
    Action that allows a player to handle an incoming shot by allocating power from batteries.
    KillMembersAction
    Action that allows a player to kill crew members according to housing usage limits.
    LandOnPlanetAction
    Action that allows a player to land on a specified planet.
    MeteorDefenseAction
    Action that allows a player to defend against a meteor by allocating power from batteries and firing a cannon.
    ObserveMiniDeckAction
    Action that allows a player to observe the mini deck of AdventureCards.
    PlaceShipCardAction
    Action that allows a player to place a ShipCard on their ShipBoard at specified coordinates.
    ReleaseMiniDeckAction
    Action that allows a player to release the mini deck back into the game.
    ReleaseShipCardAction
    Action that allows a player to release a previously held ship card back into the free pool.
    RemoveShipCardAction
    Action that allows a player to remove a ship card from their ShipBoard at the specified coordinates.
    RepairShipBoardAction
    Action that allows a player to repair their ship by removing damaged cards at specified coordinates.
    ReserveShipCardAction
    Action that allows a player to reserve a ship card, adding it to their board.
    ResetBuildingTimerAction
    Action that allows a player to reset the building phase timer.
    RewardDecisionAction
    Action that allows a player to accept or decline a reward decision.
    SelectAliensAction
    Action that allows a player to select an AlienUnit and assign it to a HousingUnit.
    SetTestDeckAction
    Action that allows a player to set the game to use a test AdventureCard deck.
    UseBatteriesAction
    Action that allows a player to allocate power from batteries for an action.
    UseReservedShipCardAction
    Action that allows a player to use a previously reserved ShipCard at specified coordinates.
